import { Input } from "antd"; import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { useFormik } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; export default function Register() { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { hoTen: "", taiKhoan: "", matKhau: "", email: "", soDt: "", maNhom: "", }, validationSchema: Yup.object().shape({ hoTen: Yup.string().required("Please input your fullname!"), taiKhoan: Yup.string() .min(3, "'Account name' must be more than 3 characters") .max(30, "'Account name' must be less than 30 characters") .required("Please input your account name!"), matKhau: Yup.string() .min(6, "'Password' must be more than 6 characters") .required("Please input your password!"), email: Yup.string() .email("Invalid email") .required("Please input your email!"), }), onSubmit: (value) => { console.log("values", value); }, }); return (

Register for a free account

Already have an account?{" "} {" "} Login

); }
